title: Sona litle lag at first q pressed.
body:
It seems that this litle "lag" when the q is pressed is general, not only me got it. It's not really bothering but sometimes we go in the first fight and then we lag, we might die for the 2 second of laging moment. Please rio verifie. 
It's not big but it happens. 
Thank you.
Love ap Sona{{champion:37}}

replies.body: My first Q is usually at the fountain, but I think I remember this happening once when I didn't. Glad this is being looked into
This is a known issue, we're looking into it! :]
What kind of sona player doesn't charge her passive in base?
From my experience, it's when the first Q hits an opponent. You can reduce it somewhat by using a Q beforehand but you still get a spike when you Q an enemy.
Actually I noticed that too, the last time I played sona, I had pressed Q on a jungle invade and my screen froze for a second.  The rest of the game it didn't happen though.
That what i tryed to say it happens once then nothing
Happens to me too, whether I am Sona or someone else is; on the first use of q the game stops for a second and then continues on as normal.
